version_description: bug fixes for DSF file's playback.
bug fixes for DSF file's playback.

• Support for iOS 8 and 64-bit devices added
• Navigation to previous screen by swiping right
• Display of warning message when replacing a cue that is being edited
• Support the transfer files from Mac using AirDrop.
*Note: iOS 8, OS X Yose

• Support for iOS 8 and 64-bit devices added
• Navigation to previous screen by swiping right
• Display of warning message when replacing a cue that is being edited
• Support the transfer files from Mac using AirDrop.
*Note: iOS 8, OS X Yose

• Support for real-time DSD conversion and playback functionality (Compatible with 64-bit CPU devices such as iPhone 5s and iPhone 6 only).
• Supports folder transfer via AirDrop.
• bug fixes
